t: Amazon rainforest fires rage in sobering views from space - CNET
s: August 22, 2019 - Satellites are tracking a record number of wildfires burning across Brazil's rainforest.

t: Project Kuiper
s: Project Kuiper combines a low Earth orbit satellite constellation with compact, affordable customer terminals, a global network of ground stations, and resilient communications infrastructure powered by Amazon Web Services (AWS).

t: Amazon wants to launch thousands of satellites so it can offer broadband internet from space
s: April 4, 2019 - Known as Project Kuiper, the move represents the latest space ambition from Jeff Bezos. Amazon has previously announced its cloud business will build a network of satellite facilities on Earth and Bezos' space venture Blue Origin continues to move closer to launching space tourists.

s: Get help setting up and troubleshooting common issues with Fire TV devices.

t: Amazon launches first Kuiper internet satellites, taking on Starlink | Reuters
s: 1 month ago - WASHINGTON, April 28 (Reuters) - The first 27 satellites for Amazon's Kuiper broadband internet constellation were launched into space from Florida on Monday, kicking off the long-delayed deployment of an internet-from-space network that will rival SpaceX's Starlink.

t: A rocket launch Monday night may finally jump-start Amazon’s answer to Starlink - Ars Technica
s: 1 month ago - Amazon's Project Kuiper, costing up to $20 billion, will beam high-speed, low-latency broadband signals to consumers around the world. Monday's milestone launch kicks off a test campaign in low-Earth orbit to verify the functionality and performance of Amazon's satellites.

t: Amazon v. SpaceX: Satellite launch kicks off a billionaires’ battle to beam internet to Earth | CNN
s: 1 month ago - Amazon has launched the first installment of its Project Kuiper satellite internet service. It’s aiming to take on the dominance of SpaceX’s Starlink.

t: Amazon launches first two satellites in planned orbital internet service | Satellites | The Guardian

t: Amazon builds US$120 million satellite processing hub - Telco/ISP - iTnews
s: July 24, 2023 - Amazon is building a US$120 million ($178 million) processing facility at NASA's Kennedy Space Center in Florida for its thousands of planned Kuiper internet satellites.

t: SpaceX will take some Amazon satellites to space | The Verge
s: December 1, 2023 - Project Kuiper is Amazon’s low Earth orbit satellite program that could eventually provide users across the globe with internet connectivity. t: Amazon launches its first internet satellites | Information Age | ACS

t: ground-station

t: Amazon Takes on Starlink With 'Project Kuiper' Satellite Network | Extremetech

t: Amazon launches first Kuiper internet satellites in bid to take on Elon Musk's Starlink
s: 1 month ago - After the first launch was postponed due to weather, Amazon's Kuiper satellites are off to space.

t: Amazon’s Project Kuiper set for first full-scale satellite launch
s: United Launch Alliance will send 27 Kuiper satellites into low Earth orbit as we begin a full-scale deployment of our satellite internet network.

t: Project Kuiper - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - On July 30, 2020, the Federal Communications Commission granted Amazon approval to deploy a constellation of 3,236 satellites into low Earth orbit. Deployment is planned in five phases, and internet service will begin once the first 578 satellites are launched.

t: Project Kuiper

t: Amazon takes first step toward satellite internet service with successful launch
s: Amazon's Project Kuiper is planning to send thousands of satellites into space to provide high-speed, affordable internet across the world.
